long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a helper extensions for the web app ATAAPS used by many federal agencies to input time cards.
Important: This extension is not affiliated with ATAAPS or the federal government, is made by a single current federal employee

Features:
- Save timecard templates
- Create Leave request templates
- use created templates in ATAAPS to save time, instead of manually adding work schedules or leave requests.

Why is this here?
1. ATAAPS lacks some of the features modern web applications have, like autocomplete and search features.
2. While ATAAPS has a feature to automatically fill out your timecard every paid period some organizations either don't do it, or want to do it.
3. But lastly this is made because I can (well I wanted to see if I could.)

First time setup:
To allow the extension to get the ATAAPS options
- Go to to the labor page and add a new row (this pull the options for schedule templates)
- ATAAPS Menu => Labor => insert row

To get the leave request options
- Go to the create new leave request window (that's it)
- ATAAPS Menu => Leave Request => New Leave Request

Verifying data
- To verified that ATAAPS data has been loaded, click on the extension icon and then click on "show data"
